column4: hello, having problems with updating ubuntu edgy with apt-get dist-upgrade or aptitude dist-upgrade - it's telling me that linux-image-generic and linux-restricted-modules-2.6.17-11-generic are broken ;/ aptitude wants to remove all of the kernels, and apt-get doesn't want to do anything now.. any ideas on how to fix?
Check out the green box at ubuntuforums.org
That is the same problem that many other people are having.
i see... thanks! :) i'm revieing the forums
